txt.en: Fire threatens to consume this building if it is not extinguished soon. You should look for something to use near the water to put the flames out.
Fire threatens to consume this building if it is not extinguished soon. You should look for something to use near the water to put the flames out.
You have successfully extinguished the flames of the burning building.
Find something to carry water in
Found a bucket suitable for carrying water
Look for something to carry water in
Fire threatens to consume this building if it is not extinguished soon. You should look for something to use near the water to put the flames out.
Fires rage throughout the lumber-yard, but this one threatens to consume this building if it is not extinguished immediately.
Throw the bucket of water onto the flames of the burning building
The flames begin to dissipate, replaced by trails of steam
Throw the bucket of water onto the flames of the burning building
The flames begin to dissipate, replaced by trails of steam
You have successfully extinguished the flames of the burning building.
The burning building is in the lumber-yard, north-east of Aldburg.\n\nYou should bring the bucket full of water back to the burning building and extinguish the flames.
